description: Opposition groups fear Prime Minister Viktor Orban has greatly expanded his powers amid the crisis.
title: Coronavirus: Hungary votes to end Viktor Orban emergency powers
title_page: Coronavirus: Hungary votes to end Viktor Orban emergency powers - BBC News
maintext: Thanks to the second bill passed at the same time, the government can in future declare a "state of health emergency", nudge parliament aside and rule by decree for as long as it wishes. "Those who have been sounding the alarm that the government can and will abuse the powers it gained in relation to managing the Covid-19 crisis were in fact right," says the Hungarian Helsinki Committee, an NGO.
